/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image captures a bustling street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a pedestrian's viewpoint on the sidewalk, immersing the viewer in the city's daily life. The street is lined with modern buildings, their glass and steel facades reflecting the clear blue sky. Cars and bicycles are parked along the side of the road, hinting at the city's active lifestyle. The sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow on the scene and highlighting the vibrant colors of the cityscape.
